<a name="properties-"></a>
  - **mode**: `GimpColorManagementMode` (read/write)
  - **rgb  -profile**: `GimpConfigPath` (read/write)

  - **display  -use  -black  -point  -compensation**: `gboolean` (read/write)
  - **display  -optimize**: `gboolean` (read/write)
